name: Kirbinator
description: Stochastic audio processor that continuously records audio and plays back pitched, reversed, and panned slices based on probabilities triggered by Mark and Trigger inputs. Features random seed control and mutation for repeatable/evolving patterns.

specifications.name: Buffer size
specifications.description: The maximum size of the audio buffer.

parameters.name: Pitch up
parameters.description: Probability that playback will be pitched up.

parameters.name: Pitch down
parameters.description: Probability that playback will be pitched down.

parameters.name: Fifths
parameters.description: Probability that pitch shift (if up/down) will be a perfect fifth; otherwise, an octave.

parameters.name: Reverse
parameters.description: Probability that playback will be reversed.

parameters.name: Glide
parameters.description: Probability that a glide will be applied to any pitch change.

parameters.name: Stutter
parameters.description: Probability that playback of the new slice will be stuttered (initial part repeated).

parameters.name: Triplet
parameters.description: If 'Metrical' stutter is selected, probability that stutter is triplet division, else power of 2.

parameters.name: Play
parameters.description: Probability that playback will actually happen; otherwise, playback stops.

parameters.name: Glide control
parameters.description: Sets whether a single glide time is used, or independent times for up and down glides.

parameters.name: Glide
parameters.description: Glide time to apply if glide is activated (when Glide control is Single).

parameters.name: Glide up
parameters.description: Glide up time (when Glide control is Independent).

parameters.name: Glide down
parameters.description: Glide down time (when Glide control is Independent).

parameters.name: Through zero
parameters.description: Whether glides are allowed when playback direction reverses (can produce tape stop effect).

parameters.name: Min stutter
parameters.description: Minimum number of restarts if stutter is activated.

parameters.name: Max stutter
parameters.description: Maximum number of restarts if stutter is activated.

parameters.name: Min jump
parameters.description: Minimum number of slices away from current record position to jump.

parameters.name: Max jump
parameters.description: Maximum number of slices away from current record position to jump.

parameters.name: Stutter Type
parameters.description: Sets whether stutter is Free (unconstrained) or Metrical (powers of 2/3).

parameters.name: Pitch offset
parameters.description: Constant pitch change applied to playback, added to probabilistic pitch change.

parameters.name: Glide offset
parameters.description: Constant glide time applied, added to probabilistic glide.

parameters.name: Fade
parameters.description: Fade in/out time for slice playback.

parameters.name: Random seed
parameters.description: Random seed to apply (if non-zero) for repeatable patterns.

parameters.name: Apply seed
parameters.description: Applies the random seed when the parameter goes from 0 to 1.

parameters.name: Mutate
parameters.description: Degree of mutation (blend) from the current random seed to the next.

parameters.name: Trigger hold time
parameters.description: Time trigger must be held; releasing after this time stops playback (0=Off).

parameters.name: Buffer size
parameters.description: The audio buffer size (max set by specifications).

parameters.name: Feedback
parameters.description: Attenuation of existing buffer content per recording pass (-24dB = replace).

parameters.name: Detect
parameters.description: Enables automatic transient detection to create marks.

parameters.name: Sensitivity
parameters.description: Transient detection sensitivity.

parameters.name: Dry gain
parameters.description: Level of the input signal passed through to the output (-40dB = off).

parameters.name: Effect gain
parameters.description: Output level of the Kirbinator effect.

parameters.name: Pan mean
parameters.description: Average pan position of slice playback.

parameters.name: Pan deviation
parameters.description: Amount of random deviation from average pan position per trigger.

parameters.name: Left/mono input
parameters.description: The left or mono audio input.

parameters.name: Right input
parameters.description: The right audio input (0 = None).

parameters.name: Left/mono output
parameters.description: The left or mono audio output.

parameters.name: Right output
parameters.description: The right audio output (0 = None).

parameters.name: Output mode
parameters.description: The standard Add/Replace mode selector as described above.

parameters.name: Mark input
parameters.description: Bus to use as the Mark signal (defines slices).

parameters.name: Trigger input
parameters.description: Bus to use as the Trigger signal (initiates playback/parameter change).

parameters.name: Stop input
parameters.description: A trigger on this bus stops the currently playing slice (0 = None).

parameters.name: Pitch offset input
parameters.description: A 1V/octave pitch CV on this bus is added to the 'Pitch offset' parameter (0 = None).
